DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study evaluate safety LY3041658 healthy participant , include first generation Japanese . The study also investigate drug process affect key immune cell . Study participation last 4 month . Protocol amend January , 2016 include first generation Japanese participant .
DOC.criteria: All : Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 32.0 kilogram per square meter ( kg/m² ) . Absolute neutrophil count screen ≥1.8 ≤7.2 x 10^3/microliter ( uL ) , inclusive . Firstgeneration Japanese : Participant , biological parent , biological grandparent must exclusive Japanese descent bear Japan . Are 20 65 year age , inclusive , time initial screening . Have receive antibodybased biologic agent ( market investigational ) within 3 month 5 half life ( t1/2 ) drug ( whichever longer ) prior screen .
